DOC.brief_summary: To assess in subjects with and without functional dyspepsia the effects of Z-338 on: 1. Type and severity of symptoms a standardized nutrient challenge 2. The gastric nutrient distribution and gastric emptying of a standardized nutrient challenge 3. The association of the above with the manifestations of symptoms and symptom pattern
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Z-338 in Subjects With and Without Functional Dyspepsia
DOC.criteria: 1. Subjects with functional dyspepsia Positive documented diagnosis of FD via RomeII criteria and three or more moderate symptoms of Gastrointestinal Score 2. Subjects with no history of functional dyspepsia Clinical assessment, physical examination and laboratory testing without evidence for relevant abnormality. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
